subject: Re: [junit] Junit test for applet
msgSnippet: Depending on whether you have any GUI requirements, different tools might be more or less suitable. Try the following: http://abbot.sourceforge.net
messageBody:
Depending on whether you have any GUI requirements, different tools
might be more or less suitable.

Try the following:
http://abbot.sourceforge.net
http://jfcunit.sourceforge.net
http://pounder.sourceforge.net

I believe all of these have some level of applet testing support.

On Thursday, October 24, 2002, at 08:55 AM, lemon zheng wrote:

> Hi all,
>
> A question about the unit test for applet. Can we use
> the junit or other related tools to implement the test
> case about applet. If yes, where and how?
>
> Thanks,
>
> Lemon
